Pricing.title: Pricing Plans
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your needs
Pricing.description: Flexible pricing plans designed to scale with your business

enterprise.question: Questions about enterprise security, procurement, or custom contracts?

business.feature1: Privacy mode enforced for entire organization

q1.question: Why isn't this completely free?
q1.answer: Running large language models costs significant money. We need to cover those costs to provide a sustainable, high-quality service.

q2.question: What are premium models?
q2.answer: Premium models include GPT-4, GPT-4o, Claude 3.5/3.7 Sonnet, and more. You get 500 fast requests and unlimited slow requests per month.

q3.question: Who owns the code generated by our service?
q3.answer: You do! Whether you're on Free, Pro, or Business, all generated code belongs to you and can be used for any purpose, including commercial.

q4.question: What's the difference between fast and slow requests?
q4.answer: Fast requests for premium models are prioritized in our backend. If you hit the fast limit on Pro, you can still use premium models but may experience queuing during high load.

q5.question: How do the limits work for each plan?
q5.answer: If you exceed limits, we may ask you to upgrade. Premium models are available for up to 50 free uses.

q6.question: What code is stored?
q6.answer: With 'Privacy Mode' enabled, no code leaves your machine and isn't used for training. Otherwise, we may collect usage and telemetry for service improvement.
